#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;

int main()
{
	std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		ll s,e,n;
		scanf("%lld %lld",&s,&e);
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		int flag=0;
		while(n--)
		{
			ll a,b;
			scanf("%lld %lld",&a,&b);
			if((a>s&&a<e) || (b>s&&b<e) || (a<=s&&b>=e))
				{
					//printf("NO\n");
					flag=1;
					//goto label;
				}
		}
		//label:;
		if(flag==0)
			printf("YES\n");
		else
			printf("NO\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
